files.name: README.md
files.content:
# blinker-py
Blinker python library for hardware. Works with Raspberry Pi, Banana Pi, linux.  

read more: https://doc.blinker.app

files.name: README.rst
files.content:
# blinker-py
Blinker python library for hardware. Works with Raspberry Pi, Banana Pi, linux.  

read more: https://doc.blinker.app

files.name: requirements.txt
files.content:
aiohttp~=3.7.4
certifi~=2021.10.8
loguru~=0.5.3
paho-mqtt~=1.6.1
Rx~=3.2.0
websockets~=10.2
apscheduler~=3.9.1
getmac~=0.8.3
zeroconf~=0.38.4
requests~=2.27.1

files.name: setup.cfg
files.content:
[metadata]
name = blinker-py
version = 0.3.0
author = stao
author_email = werewolf_st@hotmail.com
description = Blinker library in python
long_description = file: README.md
long_description_content_type = text/markdown
url = https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-py
project_urls =
    Bug Tracker = https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-py/issues
classifiers =
    Programming Language :: Python :: 3
    License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License
    Operating System :: OS Independent

[options]
package_dir =
    = src
packages = find:
python_requires = >=3.6
install_requires =
    aiohttp~=3.7.4
    certifi~=2021.10.8
    loguru~=0.5.3
    paho-mqtt~=1.6.1
    Rx~=3.2.0
    websockets~=10.2
    apscheduler~=3.9.1
    getmac~=0.8.3
    zeroconf~=0.38.4
    requests~=2.27.1

[options.packages.find]
where = src

files.name: setup.py
files.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

__author__ = "stao"

import setuptools

setuptools.setup(
    name="blinker-py",
    version="0.3.0",
    author="stao",
    author_email="werewolf_st@hotmail.com",
    description="Blinker library in python",
    long_description=open('README.md').read(),
    long_description_content_type="text/markdown",
    url="https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-py",
    project_urls={
        "Bug Tracker": "https://github.com/blinker-iot/blinker-py/issues",
    },
    classifiers=[
        "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
        "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
        "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    ],
    package_dir={"": "src"},
    packages=setuptools.find_packages(where="src"),
    python_requires=">=3.6",
    install_requires=[
        'aiohttp~=3.7.4',
        'certifi~=2021.10.8',
        'loguru~=0.5.3',
        'paho-mqtt~=1.6.1',
        'Rx~=3.2.0',
        "websockets~=10.2",
        'apscheduler~=3.9.1',
        'getmac~=0.8.3',
        'zeroconf~=0.38.4',
        'requests~=2.27.1',
    ],
)
